name: Domintell
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room light”
”Alexa, turn on the Movie Night”
”Alexa, close the bedroom shutter”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Domintell skill for Alexa, interact with the home automation of your house or professional building and control it via voice commands. Lights, shutters/blinds, scenes are now fully integrated within the Alexa commands: tell your home automation what you want to do!

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app to link your Domintell user account and say, "Alexa, find my devices".

The Domintell Smart Home Skill is only compatible with installations equipped with a master module NewGen (DGQG02, DGQG03, DGQG04 or DGQG05) and a DNET02 module. The modules that will be visible to Alexa must be configured in your installation via the GoldenGate software.

You must also have a Domintell user account with at least one associated installation. The Domintell user account allows you to use all Domintell services with a single profile.

Lights
 • Switch on/off your smart lightings
 • Handle their intensity (dimming)
 • Switch between room moods with the scenes defined in your GoldenGate configurations

Shutters/Blinds
 • Set the room mood by controlling any blinder
 • Open/close it all when waking up or going to bed
